definitions.definition: A hierarchically structured secret organisation engaged in illegal activities like distribution of narcotics, gambling and extortion.
A trusted group of associates , as of a political leader .
An entity which attempts to control a specified arena by violence or threats.
labels: in compound terms such as "moral mafia"
definitions.label_groups: in compound terms such as "moral mafia"

main_definition: A hierarchically structured secret organisation engaged in illegal activities like distribution of narcotics, gambling and extortion.
secondary_definitions: A trusted group of associates , as of a political leader .
( in compound terms such as "moral mafia" ) An entity which attempts to control a specified arena by violence or threats.
